item.title: JMP upgrades Roku, says stock is poised to dominate the U.S. streaming market
item.description: The firm believes Roku could be a major beneficiary from the rapidly growing advertising spend in connected TV, or CTV.

item.title: Qorvo gets an upgrade from Morgan Stanley after activist investor takes stake in chipmaker
item.description: Analyst Joseph Moore upgraded the semiconductor and radio frequency chipmaker to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: Jefferies downgrades Apple to rare underperform rating, says revenue may disappoint
item.description: The firm changed its rating to underperform from hold.

item.title: Stanley Druckenmiller says 'animal spirits' are back in markets because of Trump with CEOs 'giddy'
item.description: "I'd say CEOs are somewhere between relieved and giddy. So we're a believer in animal spirits," Druckenmiller said.

item.title: How stocks, gold and bitcoin fared in the first 100 days of Trump’s last presidency – and where they could go from here
item.description: Three investors shared their beliefs on whether certain asset classes could mirror their performances from Trump's first 100 days in office last time ...
